Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts benefits from the excluded worker fund from New York state income taxes
Summary: Exempts benefits from the excluded worker fund from New York state income taxes.
LawCode: Amd Part EEE ยง2, Chap 59 of 2021; amd ยง601, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and part EEE of chapter 59 of the laws of 2021 amending the tax law establishing the excluded workers fund to provide payments to workers who suffered a loss of work-related earnings or a major source of household income during a state of emergency declared by the governor and who are otherwise ineligible for unemployment insurance or other state or federal unemployment benefit, in relation to exempting benefits from the excluded worker fund from New York state income taxes
